comment:
* A special string manipulation class. Just records removals and executes the when onString()
     * is called.

variables.name: mRemovedChars
variables.comment:
* One bit per char in string. If bit is set, character needs to be removed. If whole
         * bit field is not initialized nothing needs to be removed.

methods.name: void removeRange(int firstRemoved, int firstNonRemoved)
methods.comment:
* Mark all chars in a range {@code [firstRemoved - firstNonRemoved[} (not including
         * firstNonRemoved) as removed.

methods.name: void removeAllCharAfter(int firstRemoved)
methods.comment: * Remove all characters after and including {@code firstRemoved}.

methods.name: int length()
methods.comment: * Return length or the original string

methods.name: int codePointAt(int offset)
methods.comment: * Return codePoint of original string at a certain {@code offset}
